name: IR-GTS-BW-new
tagline: Continuation of infinitely.recursive and LordLandon's IR-GTS project
body:
IR-GTS-BW-new
=============

This is a resurrection/modification of the [Infinite Recursion GTS project](https://code.google.com/p/ir-gts/) distributed under the GNU GPL v3, and by the express permission of the original creators, infinitely.recursive and LordLandon.

This project has been tested extensively on Windows, thoroughly on Linux (wheezy and iOS), and not at all on all other platforms. You have been warned.

# Getting started

## Download and Install Python

First, you'll need to download Python. And not any old Python, Python 2.7. [Here's the download page](http://www.python.org/download/), and remember to download Python 2.7, not Python 3!

## Download IR-GTS-BW-new

You should see a "Download .zip" button at the top of this page. Press it, and unzip the downloaded file's contents somewhere on your computer.

## Run IR-GTS-BW-new

Inside all the unzipped stuff, you should find "ir-gts-bw-new.py." Double-click it and follow the potentially easy menus and instructions!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
